pullrequest.title: Utilities for test suites, PY2 constant, minor version bump, smarter check_version()

content.raw: We are. But, this pull request is important for precisely that reason: if someone updates qtutils to 2.0.0 but is on a non-qtutils 2.0.0 compatible version of say, BLACS, then with this pull request at least they'll get an error telling them to downgrade qtutils.
content.html: We are. But, this pull request is important for precisely that reason: if someone updates qtutils to 2.0.0 but is on a non-qtutils 2.0.0 compatible version of say, BLACS, then with this pull request at least they'll get an error telling them to downgrade qtutils.
